Style guide

Proudly Serving style guide.

Editorial

  • Write using plain language
  • Follow 18Fâ€™s inclusive language style guide
  • Write for a non-technical audience.
  • Be concise
  • Avoid acronyms or jargon
  • Use active voice instead of passive voice
  • Use descriptive links
  • Avoid using footnotes

Brand

  • Color: #3333A3
  • Font: Public Sans (created by the U.S. Government)
  • Cover image: Laurel wreath by Jems Mayor from Noun Project
  • Assets (GitHub / Figma / Canva)
